title: Quarkus 2.8.3.Final released - Maintenance release
content: We just released Quarkus 2.8.3.Final which is the third and probably last maintenance release for our 2.8 release train. 2.9.0.Final will be released next week. It is a safe upgrade for anyone already using 2.8. If you are not using 2.8 already, please refer to the 2.8 migration guide. Full...
